# Summon Firearm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pearl worth at least 500 gp)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** One personal firearm or crossbow weighing up to 10 lb.

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** 1001 Spells (Rite Publishing), pg. 229

You can call forth one small loaded firearm or crossbow directly to your hand. The loaded firearm or crossbow must be one you have previously had in your possession. The loaded firearm or crossbow is summoned from any distance, but not from a different plane.
